headline: CPGIO Expands Digital Retail Footprint with Strategic Marketplace Launches Across Nordstrom, Chewy, Lowe's, Faire, and Best Buy
summary: CPGIO, a leading e-commerce growth solution for consumer brands, today announced the successful launch of multiple strategic marketplace partnerships, expanding its digital retail footprint across Nordstrom, Chewy, Lowe's, Faire, and Best Buy. The expansion marks a significant milestone in the company's mission to empower brands with comprehensive omnichannel distribution capabilities.

thumbnail.caption: CPGIO helps brands execute the ideal pack-out and pricing strategy across all relevant 3P marketplaces. (PRNewsfoto/CPGIO LLC)
